BITMAP *  spr,
int  mode,

int  lifetime,
int  color,
double  vx,
double  vy,
double  vz,
double  ax,
double  ay,
double  az 
)

Add a particle to a particle system.

Parameters:
psysAimed particle system
sprSprite of the particle, if any
modeType of particle, NORMAL_PART or SINUS_PART, coupled eventually with TRANS_PART|RECYLCING_PART
off_xofsset X from particle system X source
off_yofsset Y from particle system Y source
off_zofsset Z from particle system Z source
lifetimeLifetime of the particle
colorcolor of the particle
vxX speed of the particle
vyY speed of the particle
vzZ speed of the particle
axX acceleration of the particle
ayY acceleration of the particle
azZ acceleration of the particle
Returns:
TRUE or FALSE
